name: Dice Age
description:
In this jam, we created a strategy game were dices control your economy, science and military progression. This game is made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022, with the theme "ROLL OF A DICE".

It is quite complicated and has some unique mechanics in it, so we suggest you see the tutorial and the tips we wrote for you.

You can access the audio menu by pressing "M" and/or "Esc".

We hope you enjoy playing as much as we enjoyed making it. 

Programming: greenphox

Art (dices) and Music (and all sfx) : Manis

I would like to thank https://www.kenney.nl for all the assets we found in their site, like the tilemap and many ui icons.
